topic.title: help me!!i can not publish my site becuase i cannot open port 15441
topic.body: because i didn't have independent public ip address.i just can admin my professional router instead of ISP router

topic.title: i create zite in the linux.then i visite the zite i created as a test but the browser page showed peer not found.
topic.body: why the zite i created cannot visited by the visitors.the port 15441 port is closed because i cannot administor the ISP router,but so many zeronet developers told me that the site can be visited even if the creator close the 15441 port

topic.title: ok,let's talk in english here.but we should build other Chinese ZEROTALK zite
can i upload the picture to the ZEROTALK?
topic.body: I didn't find the upload button here.of course , it is not necessary here.but i want to build my own zite with upload picture function. i didn't know if i can implement that.

topic.title: why i cannot visite my zite on another computer after i had published my site succesfully
topic.body: i can visite my zite on https://bit.no.com:43110/1A2YEocLvAV2pbPa4VJPDm3GNVyLYCMCsX successfully. but when i viewed my zite on http://127.0.0.1:43110/1A2YEocLvAV2pbPa4VJPDm3GNVyLYCMCsX, it showed no found peer.

topic.title: how to make my site have enough connect to ensure whoever people can view my zite as they want whenever.

1_16UbJDyboDaAjW5fiZouKWpPJztpt43kEj.body:
> [mynameislegion](#comment_25_1NAaF8VitwKSPo79RzJFhqz14gndmdWcGV): You can publish even if the port is closed, or if you have another port that you would like to use run "python zeronet.py --fileserver_port [portnumber]"

########HERE IS THE CONSOLE INFO#############
- Starting ZeroNet...
- OpenSSL loaded, version: 01000207F
- Version: 0.5.3 r2004, Python 2.7.11 (default, Jan  7 2016, 23:20:55) 
[GCC 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-16)], Gevent: 1.2.1
- Loading site...
- Creating FileServer....
TorManager Tor controller connect error: error: [Errno 111] Connection refused in TorManager.py line 159 > _socket2.py line 231
FileServer Checking port 15441 using portchecker.co...
FileServer [BAD :(] Port closed: Port 15441 is closed.
FileServer Trying to open port using UpnpPunch...

Site:1NXGcr..Fpj9 Publishing content.json to 5/0 peers (connected: 0) diffs: [] (0.00k)...
- No peers found, sitePublish command only works if you already have visitors serving your site
#######################################################

> [flappyearz](#comment_5_1QEfmMwKVxgR4rkREbdJYjgUmF3Zy8pwHt): Do I look like someone who talks in such hieroglyphs? :-PWhy do you chinese people spam your gibberish everywhere? We cannot read it. don't be aggressive.he really helped me
